attributes.action: exempt people with an annual income of £14,000 or less  from paying tax or insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the gap between the have and have-nots getting wider with each passing year and the cost of living out pacing any pay rise these people may receive they cannot afford to carry on contributing to society and have a decent standard of living also these people should be  automatically put through the system to get any benefit they are entitled to without going through the mine field of red tape people above this level should have a step system on ability to pay
